data.title: Victoria's Secret 2017: All you need to know about model Lais Ribeiro
data.meta_description: Lais Ribeiro is the lucky Victoria's Secret Angel, who will wear the coveted Fantasy Bra this year at Victoria's Secret Fashion Show 2017, to be held..
data.text:
Victoria's Secret Angel Lais Ribeiro has been keeping a secret for too long. But unable to hold on to it any longer, the model, who has been training super hard for the upcoming Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in Shanghai, revealed it to her fans on Instagram; thus adding the last missing detail to the hot updates on the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show 2017. Though we already revealed to you the list of all the hottest models who will be walking the ramp, including the models who will be making their Victoria's Secret debut, the one thing that was missing was the model who would be wearing the much-awaited Fantasy Bra. However, we finally have the answer to it and you're going to like it. Turns out Lais Ribeiro, the Brazilian model, will be the one to wear the coveted Fantasy Bra, which costs about $2 million or close to INR13 crore. While she had been tight-lipped about it for a long time, the model recently made the announcement on her social media handle, revealing the look of the Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra - and of herself in it. But regardless of what she's wearing, Lais is always ramp-ready. Take a look:

Meet Lais Ribeiro, the Victoria’s Secret Angel who will wear the Fantasy Bra this year
